content: this beginner-friendly pattern uses just two simple stitches to create a twisted mesh-like fabric that s fun to make and fast to finish notes ----- * this cowl is worked as a flat rectangle then the ends are seamed together to make a möbius strip you ll put a half-twist in the cowl * the stitch pattern for the main body of the cowl is double_crochet linen stitch you ll alternate dcs and chs to get a checkerboard pattern * the chain 3 at the beginning of each row counts as a double_crochet in the following row you ll work into the top chain of the chain 3 treating the chain 3 like a double_crochet * asterisks * indicate pattern repeats repeat between the *s as indicated materials --------- * 1 skein malabrigo rios the model colorway is #859 primavera * us h/5 0 mm crochet hook or size needed to obtain gauge * darning needle * two locking stitch markers to track the end of the row optional size ---- * before seaming 11 5 wide 24 long * after seaming and blocking 11 5 tall 23 around the half-twist you ll add when seaming shortens it a bit
